title: Only On Social Media: State Of The Union In 3 Words, And An International Selfie Incident
teaser: Annie Colbert joins us for a look at how the news has been reverberating through the lens of social media.
contentencoded:
Annie Colbert, viral content editor at the news and social media site Mashable joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson for a look at how the news has been reverberating through the lens of social media. She discusses the NFL playoff games, attempts to sum up the State of the Union in three words (#StateOfTheUnionInThreeWords), and a beauty queen selfie that became an international incident.

Guest

  • Annie Colbert, viral content editor at the news and social media website Mashable. She tweets @anniecolbert.
